name.baseName: Printing ; Printed products (substrate is paper), printed products (substrate is plastic), printed products (substrate is metal), printed products (other substrates) ; Ink cleaning agent (water-based) ; Lithographic printing, gravure printing, letterpress printing (flexographic printing), stencil printing (screen printing), digital printing ; All sizes; NESPS2
印刷 ; 印刷品（承印物为纸）、印刷品（承印物为塑料）、印刷品（承印物为金属）、印刷品（其他承印物） ; 油墨清洗剂（水基型） ; 平版印刷、凹版印刷、凸版印刷（柔性版印刷）、孔版印刷（丝网印刷）、数字印刷 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程涉及在包括纸张、塑料、金属和其他材料在内的各种承印物上使用不同印刷技术（如平版、凹版、凸版（柔性版）、孔版（丝网）和数字印刷）进行印刷活动。该数据集适用于使用水基型油墨清洗剂的各种规模的印刷作业。此过程数据可用作印刷过程清洗步骤中挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）排放治理的参考。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码23,三级代码231.0文件，在完整版文件中第516页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为油墨清洗剂（水基型），此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management94，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是3、蓄热式热力燃烧法，其效率为94，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/总生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the treatment technology for the pollution of volatile organic compounddidn't offered，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是12、热力燃烧，其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行时间（小时/年）/总生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
